description.@en: You are rarely comfortable in one place, possessing a strong sense of wanderlust. You have learned to live off of roots and bark when necessary. The dangers of the wilds persist and just a few minutes of shut-eye here and there are enough to live by.

effect.@en: You are always able to provide enough food and water to live on, never suffering from the effects of Starvation or Sleep Deprivation.
